author: dsmiley
msg: SOLR-3161 An incoming isShard=true should be limited to a SearchHandler. Protects against shards.qt=/update attack

msg: SOLR-3161 limit qt=/... (leading /) to refer to a SearchHandler for safety

author: rgoers
msg: Fix FileAppenderTest and OutputStreamAppenderTest on Windows

author: bodewig
msg: true is not in /bin on FreeBSD but in /usr/bin.  Take the opportunity to use a more useful dummy command.
